title: 1. Trailer
desc: This is the part where your audience decides whether to continue watching or leave. A trailer is a taste of what the episode is-a 60-second snippet designed to capture attention. 99% of podcasts don't have one. Why? Because it's hard.

title: 2. Stinger
desc: Then comes a 10-second intro: your branding, your personality, your music. This should come after the trailer.

title: 3. Clips
desc: People today have short attention spans. It takes about 3 seconds for the brain to decide whether to keep watching or scroll away. That's called a hook-and yes, we do that.

title: 4. Monetize
desc: The hard part is the reward. The reward happens when trust is built. Trust then converts into revenue through sponsorships, partnerships, affiliate offers, and the host's own products or services -not through the platform itself.
